itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Mediah Northern Highlands and Elric Shrine. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering White Cedar Trees.

item.name: Mediah Fishing Rod
item.desc: Ash tree float. It shortens the auto-fishing time.\n\nCan be enhanced with Blackstone (Weapon).

item.name: White Cedar Timber Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 10 planks of White Cedar Timber.

item.name: White Wagon Flag
item.desc:
A flag for a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: White Wagon Wheel
item.desc:
A wheel that can be installed on a wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: White Cedar Plywood
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping White Cedar Timber. It requires the knowledge of Chopping: Beginner.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: White Cedar Plank
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping White Cedar Timber.

item.name: Mediahn Handcrafted Chair
item.desc: A handcrafted chair from Mediah.\n- 4 Set Effect: Interior Points +200
